obathumage paminima apata loku gaurawayak” ehidi diwangatha e.ja.pa. manthri ranjith aluwiharege diyaniya saha biriya janadhipathithumata kiya sitiyaha.amathi rohana disanayakaedina janadhipathithuma athulu pirisata diwa aaharaya piliyela kara thibune mathale pihiti amathi rohana disanayakage niweseya.janadhipathithuma aluwiharaye pawathi uthsawayedi thriwidha hamuda pradhaninta da arayum kale amathi rohanage niwesata diwa aaharaya ganimata paminena lesaya.janadhipathithuma athulu thriwidha hamuda pradhanihu amathi rohanage biriya wana dhammika disanayaka piligaththe bulath hurulu dimeni.edina diwa aaharaya piliyela kara thibune deshiya aahara wargawalini.

api hamotama eka eka kaleta eka eka adahas pahala wenawane.udaharana widiyata kiwwoth oya eka eka aakaraye winodansha(muddara ekathu karanna,pinthura ekathu karanna), wiwidhakaraye krida wala niratha wenna,aluth aluth dewal(ilektronik wada,wahana ekalas karanna)wala niratha wenna hithenawane.ee atharin samahara dewal akhandawa idiriyata pawathwagena yanawa.samahara eewa kalayak giyama(ee de pilibandawa pissu watila hitiya kale nawathunama) atharala danawa.hama manussayama oya wage thama.
